Package jops.client

The JOPS client and related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JopsClient Testing class for potential BAPS replacement.
PlayerHook A class that represents a Player to the JOPS frontend, handling requests for information about that Player from the frontend.
 

Package jops.client Description

The JOPS client and related classes.

The JOPS client is the process responsible for communicating with the system user.

The client provides a Swing Graphical User Interface through which the user can control the server, eg by creating players, assigning songs to players, starting and stopping the players, and editing and deleting the players.

It communicates with the server through TCP/IP - the server need not be on the same computer as the client.
